newsitem.title: USA: AMEX to list options on Fresenius, IMNET.
newsitem.headline: AMEX to list options on Fresenius, IMNET.

text.p: American Stock Exchange said Tuesday it will list options on Fresenius Medical Care AG Sept 27.
The exchange said it will list options on IMNET Systems Inc Sept 30.
Fresenius Medical Care AG is a combination of Fresenius AG's worldwide kidney dialysis business and National Medical Care Inc, formerly a unit of W.R. Grace & Co.
Fresenius Medical Care shares, trading on a when-issued basis, were up 1/4 at 22-3/8 Tuesday afternoon.
Imnet options will have initial expiration months of October, November, February and May, and opening strike prices of 20, 22-1/2 and 25, the AMEX said.
The stock was up one at 23-1/2 Tuesday afternoon.
Susquehanna Investment Group will be the specialist.
Fresenius options will have initial expiration months of October, November, February and May, with opening strikes of 20, 22-1/2 and 25, the exchange said.
Spear, Leeds & Kellogg will be the specialist.
